packs.name: Starter Lot
packs.description: Perfect for new resellers getting started. Contains 75 phone cases, 100 cables, and 75 screen protectors. All items are tested and ready for resale. Estimated resale value: $1,250–$1,750. All reseller packs ship within 3–5 business days of payment. Tracking information is provided within 24 hours of shipment.
packs.short_description: 75 cases, 100 cables, 75 protectors - Ready to resell

packs.name: Growth Lot
packs.description: Ideal for established resellers looking to scale. Contains 150 phone cases, 200 cables, and 150 screen protectors. Higher volume for better profit margins. Estimated resale value: $2,500–$3,500. All reseller packs ship within 3–5 business days of payment. Tracking information is provided within 24 hours of shipment.
packs.short_description: 150 cases, 200 cables, 150 protectors - Scale your business

packs.name: Pro Lot
packs.description: For professional resellers and businesses. Contains 300 phone cases, 400 cables, 300 screen protectors, and 30 earbuds. Premium selection with maximum profit potential. Estimated resale value: $5,000–$7,000. All reseller packs ship within 3–5 business days of payment. Tracking information is provided within 24 hours of shipment.
packs.short_description: 300 cases, 400 cables, 300 protectors, 30 earbuds - Professional grade

packs.name: MacBook Bundle
packs.description: Premium bundle for high-end resellers. Contains 6 refurbished MacBooks with chargers. All units are tested, cleaned, and ready for resale. Perfect for tech stores and online sellers. Estimated resale value: $2,700–$3,900. All reseller packs ship within 3–5 business days of payment. Tracking information is provided within 24 hours of shipment.
packs.short_description: 6 refurbished MacBooks with chargers - Premium bundle
